text: Hello everyone! :wave: I'm working on integrating HubSpotConversations on my website and trying to utilize the `HubSpotConversations.widget.status()` method (as per <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/conversations_api/widget_status|this documentation>). Has anyone had experience with this and can offer some guidance or best practices? Thanks in advance for your help!

Customize the settings > privacy & consent > cookies tab
Hello,
I want to know how we can customize the cookies tab like in this screenshot joined.
With an app I want to deactivate the HubSpot native consent banner. Do you know how doing that (no info in the official doc)?

Thanks a lot.
Heya, would anyone happen to know if using the class “hs-search-hidden” on a containing element will omit every child element from the search resutls aswell?
yes
Hmm, thats what i thought. Im facing that it’s still showing up in my search results so I think for now i will blame cache and check back later, Thank you Federico
It will take hours for the search engine behind it to update so don't worry if it does not update immediatly
Aah gotcha, thanks! :smile:

Hi Everyone!
I'm new around here. 1st time working with HubSpot.
I am wondering how can i implement a non-hubsport form with my nextjs app to be able to create contacts in the crm? i need to make it so that the commercial team can contact the leads that come through the web page
Hey hey everyone! I am trying to set up form recipients. Is there a way to manually input emails? Or they HAVE to be users on the workspace? :cry:
They have to be users, the old option to add non users was removed

Hi All, I found this article about <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/create-and-edit-webhook-subscriptions-in-private-apps|beta webhooks for private apps>, and the documentation references the “Webhooks Tab”, but I don’t see that on my interface. Anyone solved this problem? Or know more about the webhooks for private apps?
My popup CTA isnt inheriting my site's font styles. How can i change this?
It's not currently an option with the popup CTA beta
I dont think I'm in any betas ?
Theres no way to trigger a CSS class to update this?
No CTAs have to be styled in the editor now. Unless you have access to legacy CTAs

Hi Kate, to gain access to webhooks in private apps, you must opt your account into the public beta. There are <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account/opt-your-HubSpot-account-into-a-public-beta-feature|instructions for opting in to a beta here>. Once you’re on the Betas page, you’ll want to find the beta called `[Public Beta] Private App Webhooks` and click `Join beta` . After a couple minutes, you should be able to access webhooks within your private apps. Let me know if you have any questions or feedback!
I have access to legacy, but it doesn’t help since I can’t create a pop up modal through there :’(
Yeah you can't then. You could just make your own popup modal with a custom module

Is there a way to trigger a module as a popup via another module ? I’m coming on as a new dev and trying to work off of the premade modules they previously created and idk the best ways to go about this
Yeah for sure, you could. Just a matter of coding it, and you may have to make changes to the current modules. Depends on the current setup
Do you know where I could look for this kind of info? The HS docs don’t really cover much :upside_down_face:

Yeah it won't be in HS's docs. 

You're best bet is to find a guide online on how to code a modal. Here is an example

<https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/how-to-build-a-modal-with-javascript/|https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/how-to-build-a-modal-with-javascript/>

Basically just take the code, put it in a new module and add that module to your page. Or you can add the trigger button to another module
Hey <@U03G3CW47R6> just curious if you got any solutions to this?
